title: [Shaadi.com]Custom shortlist page not accessible anymore , any clues?
selftext:
Hi,

I  couldn't find a specific reddit for shaadi.com so I am sorry for  posting it here, if someone is having this similar issue and can help.  I've been using this shaadi since a while but for like 2 weeks I notice  that the index page where I created my own lists has disappeared and is  not accessible anymore.

 Page doesn't work anymore even if I try directly  copy-paste  /index page, it's just redirects to default list(all mixed up) but the  custom ones I created are gone.

It's  really frustrating for me  :( cause I took my time to classify those profiles by creating a custom list. Their technical team  including escalation are useless and have no clue.

Here's the page that's not working anymore [image](https://imgur.com/a/i0GLpNc)

light_cleaned_title: [Shaadi.com]Custom shortlist page not accessible anymore , any clues?
light_cleaned_selftext: Hi, I couldn't find a specific reddit for shaadi.com so I am sorry for posting it here, if someone is having this similar issue and can help. I've been using this shaadi since a while but for like 2 weeks I notice that the index page where I created my own lists has disappeared and is not accessible anymore. Page doesn't work anymore even if I try directly copy-paste /index page, it's just redirects to default list(all mixed up) but the custom ones I created are gone. It's really frustrating for me :( cause I took my time to classify those profiles by creating a custom list. Their technical team including escalation are useless and have no clue. Here's the page that's not working anymore [image](https://imgur.com/a/i0GLpNc)
